system.useTime: Daemonhost require the knowledge to create them. Something beyond a simple Requisition Test to find. Consider it Unique Availability.
system.novice: The Daemonhost burns with unholy flames. Their natural weapons now inflict Energy damage and gain the Flames Quality.

description.value: Novice: The Daemonhost burns with unholy flames. Their natural weapons now inflict Energy damage and gain the Flames Quality.
